mainText:
I am so sorry to hear that Mr. Jobs passed away today.  Since the mid-80's,
I can't think of a time when I did not own an Apple device.  Mr. Jobs knew
what I needed before I knew I needed it.  I will miss his appearances at
product launches because he explained to me how the product he was
demonstrating could make me more productive (e.g., my iPad) or better yet
how I could rediscover the joy of assets I already owned (e.g., my iPod
Touch).  Mr. Jobs, I will miss your vision.  Rest in peace.
author: Bill
